Rebirth Trinkets.itemDescription: • Creates a familiar which moves around the room in a similar fashion to The Peeper, shooting tears in the same direction as Isaac.
Rebirth Trinkets.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by beating the Dark Room with Blue Baby.

Rebirth Trinkets.itemDescription: • Lowers your spacebar item charge rate by 1.; • Cannot lower the charge of your spacebar item below 1 room.; • For example, you will now be able to use a 3 room charge item after 2 rooms instead.
• Gives Isaac a higher chance to find Tarot cards after clearing a room or from chests.
• Gives you a higher chance of eternal hearts.; • Contrary to popular belief, the Bible Tract doesn't allow Angel Rooms to appear after paying for a Devil Deal.
• Increases the chance for Black hearts to spawn.
Rebirth Trinkets.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by beating the Dark Room with Eve.

Rebirth Trinkets.itemDescription: • Everytime you pick up a penny, you have a chance to spawn a red heart on the floor.
Rebirth Trinkets.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by beating the Chest with Samson.

Rebirth Trinkets.itemDescription: • Has a partial Magneto effect and will attract coins, pulling them into Isaac from a distance.; • Does not attract other pickups like the full Magneto item does.
• Has a chance (roughly 20%) to respawn with 3 Soul hearts as Blue Baby when you die.
Rebirth Trinkets.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by beating Satan with Lazarus.

Rebirth Trinkets.itemDescription: • Does the teleport effect every time you use your current spacebar item.; • Can be used infinitely every room if you have Guppy's Paw and no red heart containers (Can be exploited to get to the boss room without clearing any other rooms).
• Everytime you pick up a coin, you have a chance to spawn a bomb on the floor.
Rebirth Trinkets.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by beating Challenge #13 (Beans!).

Rebirth Trinkets.itemDescription: • Everytime you pick up a coin, you fart.
• Gives a 25% chance to reveal map icons at the start of a new floor (The same effect as the Compass).
Rebirth Trinkets.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by beating the Chest with Cain.

Rebirth Trinkets.itemDescription: • Isaac no longer takes damage from walking over spikes and blood creep while this trinket is held.

• -2 Tear Delay (Tears Up).; • The fire rate increase is applied in such a way that the higher your tear stat is, the more effective Cancer is.; • Breaks the normal fire rate cap, allowing you to fire faster than the normal maximum.

• When Isaac takes damage, there is a chance he will gain the Gamekid effect, turning him invincible and dealing contact damage to any enemies he touches.; • The chance to activate the invincibility effect is affected by your luck stat and at +38 Luck it will activate every time you get hit.

Rebirth Trinkets.itemQuote: It calls out to its brothers
Rebirth Trinkets.itemDescription: • Gives Isaac a higher chance to find hearts from drops after clearing a room and from chests.
• When picking up a coin, you have a chance to automatically gain one more coin.
Rebirth Trinkets.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by playing the shell game in the arcade 100 times.

Rebirth Trinkets.itemDescription: • When you take damage while on 1/2 a heart, you are teleported back to the previous room.
• +2 Damage Up
Rebirth Trinkets.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by beating the Dark Room with Judas.

Rebirth Trinkets.itemDescription: • When Daemon's Tail is held, most future Heart drop will be rerolled into something else, with a certain chance to be rerolled into a Black Heart.; • Every type of heart will be affected (except for hearts spawned in Super Secret Rooms) and causes Mitre, Bible Tract, Mom's Pearl to become useless.; • Upon entering a new room that already has hearts on the ground, they will all be converted into Black Hearts.; • Hearts that spawn after clearing a room, opening a chest or playing a slot machine/beggar will be re-rolled into another possible pickup that could appear. This essentially means you are sacrificing your heart drops for a higher chance of all other pickups
Rebirth Trinkets.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by beating Satan with Azazel.

Rebirth Trinkets.itemDescription: • When you kill an enemy, you have a chance to spawn a transparent Dead Bird familiar.; • The Dead Bird familiar deals 2 damage per tick to enemies while in contact with them.
Rebirth Trinkets.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by beating the Isaac boss with Eve.

Rebirth Trinkets.itemDescription: • Everytime Isaac takes damage, one blue fly will spawn.
• Everytime you pick up a coin, you have a chance to spawn a key.
• Tears become flat and disc shaped giving them a larger hitbox.; • Higher knockback effect with your tears.
• +0.15 Speed Up.

• Tears now move forwards at right angles, shifting left and right across the room.; • Increases your range stat by +10.0 while held but due to the fire pattern, your tears travel a similar distance to normal.
• After clearing a room, you have a chance to heal for half a red heart.
• While held, this trinket gives Isaac a familiar that shoots piercing tears that deal 3.5 damage.
Rebirth Trinkets.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by beating the Boss Rush with Isaac.

Rebirth Trinkets.itemDescription: • Items which cost 2 heart containers in a deal with the devil are reduced to only cost 1 heart.
Rebirth Trinkets.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by beating Satan with Judas.

Rebirth Trinkets.itemQuote: The left hand path reaps dark rewards
Rebirth Trinkets.itemDescription: • Replaces chest spawns with red chests.
Rebirth Trinkets.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by beating Ultra Pride.

Rebirth Trinkets.itemDescription: • While held, this trinket gives a random mushroom effect each room; • Possible mushrooms include: Mini Mush, Odd Mushroom (Thin), Odd Mushroom (Thick), The Compass.
• Rocks now drop money when broken.
Rebirth Trinkets.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by destroying 100 rocks.

Rebirth Trinkets.itemDescription: • +1 Luck Up while held.
Rebirth Trinkets.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by blowing up 20 shop keepers (this includes the ones in the secret room).

Rebirth Trinkets.itemDescription: • At the start of a new floor, you get an eternal heart.
Rebirth Trinkets.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by beating the Dark Room with Maggy.

Rebirth Trinkets.itemDescription: • Gives Isaac a higher chance to find bombs.; • Picking up the Match Stick is the only way to remove the Tick trinket.

• When taking damage, Isaac has a chance to deal damage to the entire room in a Necronomicon style effect.; • The chance to damage enemies is affected by your luck stat and at +50 or more Luck it will activate 50% of the time.

• Dying in a sacrifice room while holding this trinket will reveal a puzzle piece on the death screen. Finding all the puzzle pieces will help you to reveal the final secret, unlocking the hidden character 'The Lost'.; In Afterbirth dying with this trinket causes you to respawn as The Lost character and dying in a sacrifice room while holding this trinket will now unlock the Lost character.
Rebirth Trinkets.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by beating Dark Room with Isaac.

Rebirth Trinkets.itemDescription: • Higher chance to find Soul Hearts.

• Mom's Leg will now appear every 60 seconds and stomp down randomly in the room dealing 300 damage to enemies, similar to how Daddy Longlegs works but less frequent.; • Be warned though, Mom's leg can also stomp and hurt Isaac too!
• When you reach half a heart of life remaining, a black heart will spawn.; • After three black hearts have spawned, the trinket dissapears.
• Causes Isaac to create poops randomly.

• Imitates the behaviours of some of the other 'paper' items/trinkets.; • A Missing Page: When taking damage, Isaac has a chance to deal damage to the entire room in a Necronomicon style effect.; • Has a chance to trigger the Polaroid or Negative effect every time you take damage with half a red heart or less.; • Missing Poster: Dying in a sacrifice room while holding this trinket will reveal a puzzle piece on the death screen. Finding all the puzzle pieces will help you to reveal the final secret, unlocking the hidden character 'The Lost'.; • If held when you touch the chest after the Satan or Isaac fight and you don't have the relevant item to go to the next floor (Polaroid or Negative), you have a small chance to be taken there anyway.
Rebirth Trinkets.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by beating the Chest with Eden.

Rebirth Trinkets.itemDescription: • Allows you to unlock golden chests without needing a key.; • Does not work on locked rooms.; In Afterbirth Cain starts with this trinket after donating 68 coins to the Greed Donation Machine.
• While held, Isaac has a significantly higher chance to find drops when breaking poops.

• Isaac's tears have a chance to poison enemies.; • The poison effect leaves a damage over time, which deals 4 or 6 damage per tick.; • The chance to poison enemies is affected by your luck stat and at +18 Luck it will activate every time.
• Tears shrink and grow in size as they go across the room.; • Does not appear to affect your damage and only the hitbox size of tears.
• Higher chance for champion enemies while held.
• Isaac now has a chance to make a spectral and piercing tear.; • The chance to fire a piercing tear is affected by your luck stat and at +18 Luck it will activate every time.
• You have a chance when taking damage to gain +1.8 Damage Up for the rest of the room.
• While held, tears move in a spiral pattern across the screen at high speed.; • Effectively increases your range due to the tear pattern.

• Increases your chances to find an Angel Room instead of a Devil Room.; • Normally there is a 50%/50% chance of a Angel or Devil room with if a door spawns after the boss. The Rosary Bead changes this to a 75%/25% chance of an angel or devil room (respectively).
• Gives Isaac a higher chance to find keys and chests.
• Gives Isaac a higher chance to find pills.
• When you kill an enemy, you have a chance to get +0.5 damage up for the current room.
Rebirth Trinkets.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by beating the Dark Room with Samson.

Rebirth Trinkets.itemDescription: • While this trinket is held, all items in the Shop cost 0 coins.; • After buying any 0 cent item in the Shop, the trinket disappears.
Rebirth Trinkets.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by beating the Chest with Lazarus.

Rebirth Trinkets.itemDescription: • Each time you get hit, you drop a coin or two.
Rebirth Trinkets.itemUnlock: Unlock this item by beating Challenge #15 (Slow Roll).

Rebirth Trinkets.itemDescription: • When you enter a boss room, immediately remove 15% health from the boss and restore 1 red heart.; • This trinket can only be removed by picking up the Match Stick trinket, meaning you are otherwise unable to take any more trinkets unless you get the Mom's Purse item.
• If you take damage which leaves you at 1/2 a heart, you gain a Little Steve familiar that follows you and shoots homing tears.
• +0.5 Shot Speed Up.; • Your tears now whip across the room at a very high shot speed.; • Shot speed gives your tears more effective range, but doesn't increase your range stat directly.
• Tears now move in a wave fashion across the room.
